welcome: Welcome to the storied pages of the BardGuild. Please present your muse.
muse_return: Ah, the __ has returned. Do tell us of your journey.
tale_response: Thank you for that riveting tale. Please continue forth as a Build Gard Apprentice!
I'm going to stop you right there. That is not a tale worthy of the Build Gard. Please take another muse for inspiration and return to try again.
